p: WHO has drafted a global strategy to eliminate viral hepatitis as a public health concern and has regional plans in place; it is also supporting the development of some national plans 2 [ 13]. Besides its regional plan, PAHO has its existing Revolving Funds and Strategic Fund, which offer models for introducing vaccines. WHO’s Regional Office for Europe is preparing to implement the European Vaccine Action Plan 2016–2020, which includes a regional goal for controlling hepatitis B virus infection.
